title: Once The Voices Start: A Story of Family, Courage and Psychosis
description: 19-year-old Janice Li has changed.Not long ago she was a smiling softball star. Now she states, with unnerving certainty, that she is Hollae from Zujaea, here on Earth to retrieve a hidden vial to cure her dying planet. Each night, her mother gives her psychiatric pills, hoping they will bring back the old Janice. Each night Hollae flushes the pills.Hollae hears voices.Voices of three Zujaean companions compel her to take her search into a remote mountainous area. There she meets Thomas, a young man with mild autism and a fascination with the search for extraterrestrial life. Her eerie intensity leads him to believe that her story could, just maybe, be true. He vows to be her help and guide.Yet Hollae’s actions grow increasingly bizarre and abruptly she runs off. Thomas gives frantic chase into wildernesses of mountain and mind.This tense, fast-paced story follows the mystifying paths of a young woman’s psychotic illness and the forever-changed lives of those who love her.
author: G.W. Christison
